page.title: 05ECOLGY-COUNTRYSIDE-NATURE
page.content: AREA,ORIGINALLY MORE THICKLY WOODED, IS LARGELY PASTURE BUT INCREASING IN ARABLE USE.{IT IS WELL DRAINED BY {RIVER MOLE;SPRINGS,PONDS AND WELLS } {ABOUND;MAINS WATER 1890 BUT IN SOME {AREAS NOT UNTIL 1970.}WHOLE AREA IS TRAVERSED BY{PUBLIC FOOTPATHS}WHICH WITHIN LIVING MEMORY WERE REGULARLY USED FOR WORK,SHOPS,SCHOOL,CHURCH BUT NOW THEY ARE USED FOR THE PLEASURE OF WALKING AND APPRECIATION.LOCAL EFFORT GOES INTO KEEPING THEM OPEN.{HEDGES {ARE ABOUT 6km/sqkm AND CONTAIN MANY {OAK TREES WHICH ABOUND ALL OVER AREA. COSERVATION/PRESERVATION OF FAUNA AND FLORA IS A CONCERN IN THESE SQUARES. {POLLUTION-NOISE,LITTER,CHEMICALS UNDER {ATTACK.}THAMES WATER AUTHORITY LOOKS AFTER CLEANLINESS OF RIVER MOLE, MUCH EFFLUENT FROM PRIVATE SEWAGE SYSTEMS. {OUR ANIMAL COUNT CONFIRMED MUCH WILD {LIFE IN AREA,COUNT DONE BY OUR 8yrOLDS
